Probabilistic Timed Automata
============================

Python library for building and simulating probabilistic timed automata.

.. image:: https://travis-ci.com/anand-bala/probabilistic-timed-automata.svg?branch=master
  :target: https://travis-ci.com/anand-bala/probabilistic-timed-automata

.. image:: https://codecov.io/gh/anand-bala/probabilistic-timed-automata/branch/master/graph/badge.svg?token=9JIV7X4YEQ
  :target: https://codecov.io/gh/anand-bala/probabilistic-timed-automata

.. image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/probabilistic-timed-automata.svg
  :target: https://badge.fury.io/py/probabilistic-timed-automata

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/docs-link-brightgreen
  :target: https://anand-bala.github.io/probabilistic-timed-automata

Installation
------------

To install using `pip` just use:

.. code-block:: shell

    $ pip install probabilistic-timed-automata


For developers, since this project uses `poetry <https://python-poetry.org/>`_
for building/dependency management, please install that (and familiarize
yourself with it). Then, you can run:

.. code-block:: shell

    $ poetry install
